statements: SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, currency_pair FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT strategy_description, start_date, end_date FROM trading_strategies WHERE currency_pair = 'EURUSD';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, currency_pair, start_date FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE currency_pair='EURUSD' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, indicators_used FROM trading_strategies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_description LIKE '%trend%';
SELECT strategy_name, currency_pair FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY currency_pair ASC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, created_at FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT total_trades, successful_trades, profit FROM backtesting_results WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT result_id, backtest_date, profit FROM backtesting_results ORDER BY backtest_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backtesting_results WHERE backtest_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT strategy_name, COUNT(result_id) AS total_results FROM trading_strategies JOIN backtesting_results ON trading_strategies.strategy_id = backtesting_results.strategy_id GROUP BY strategy_name;
SELECT MAX(profit) AS max_profit, MIN(profit) AS min_profit FROM backtesting_results;

SELECT strategy_name, backtest_date, profit FROM trading_strategies JOIN backtesting_results ON trading_strategies.strategy_id = backtesting_results.strategy_id WHERE profit > 1000 ORDER BY profit DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, author FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backtesting_results ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, profit, trades FROM backtesting_results WHERE profit > 1000;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT description FROM trading_strategies WHERE author LIKE '%John%' AND strategy_name LIKE '%Trend%';
SELECT result_id, profit, trades FROM backtesting_results WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_id, date, sharpe_ratio, win_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT result_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE result_id = 2;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, strategy_parameters FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Trend%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT result_id, start_date, end_date FROM backtesting_results WHERE strategy_id = 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE result_id = 4 AND metric_value > 0;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_type, trade_symbol FROM trade_history WHERE result_id = 5 AND trade_type = 'Buy';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT name, strategy_type FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_type = 'Long';
SELECT * FROM backtesting_results ORDER BY total_profit DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol, buy_price, sell_price FROM trades WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_id, MAX(annual_return) AS max_annual_return FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies LIMIT 5
SELECT name, strategy_type FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_type = 'Trend Following'
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY annual_return DESC, max_drawdown ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT t.*, th.action FROM trades t JOIN trade_history th ON t.trade_id = th.trade_id WHERE t.symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT b.*, p.annual_return FROM backtesting_results b LEFT JOIN performance_metrics p ON b.strategy_id = p.strategy_id WHERE p.annual_return > 0
